summary: In 1915 a man survives the Armenian genocide in the Ottoman Empire, but loses his family, speech and faith. One night he learns that his twin daughters may be alive, and goes on a quest to find them.
cast: Tahar Rahim|Simon Abkarian|Makram Khoury|Hindi Zahra|Kevork Malikyan|Bartu Küçükçaglayan|Zein Fakhoury|Dina Fakhoury|Trine Dyrholm|Arsinée Khanjian|Akin Gazi|Arevik Martirosyan|Moritz Bleibtreu|Adam Bousdoukos|George Georgiou|Lara Heller|Katerina Poladjan|Michael S. title: El padre
